oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Public Library to Show Historical Black Film"
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Hallelujah!"; film; Vidor, King; African Americans; Memphis State University; newspapers; Memphis Public Library & Information Center;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Memphis State University "Daily Helmsman" announced the showing of the film "Hallelujah!" at the Memphis/Shelby County Public Library & Information Center followed by a panel discussion. Interview with Mrs. Carter. 2 Pages.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Donated by Rubye Woodruff Carter; Manuscript collection processed by Heather Tankersley;
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: newspaper clipping, page 1: 8.5 x 13 in., page 2: 6.3 x 9 in.
